targets.query: SELECT derivative(mean("bytes_recv"), 5m) FROM "net" WHERE ("interface" = 'eno1') AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time(1m)

SELECT "temp_input" FROM "sensors" WHERE ("chip" = 'coretemp-isa-0000') AND $timeFilter GROUP BY "chip"
